header.title: Online Foreign Language School
header.subtitle: Achieve your goals using native speaker game techniques

learnsection.description: is suitable for everyone who wants to transform their life by learning a foreign language in a short time.

cards.title: Schoolchildren
cards.text: Pass final exams or enter a university.

cards.title: Students
cards.text: Study abroad or find a high-paying job.

cards.title: Emigrants
cards.text: Adapt to a new country, gain a competitive advantage, and get employed.

cards.title: Sociable people
cards.text: Create a happy family with a foreigner and integrate into society.

cards.title: Business people
cards.text: Make useful connections and scale your business.

cards.title: Travelers
cards.text: Communicate freely, make new friends, and resolve everyday issues.

fastLearn.title: Engaging lessons
fastLearn.heading: Why you will quickly master the language

description.line1: Short but rich lessons up to 45 minutes.
description.line2: Deeper knowledge than in other schools and even more than international standards require.

format.title: Convenient learning format
format.description: Fully automated learning process on a single platform accessible from any device.

communication.title: Communication with other learners
communication.description: Internal video chat to communicate with like-minded people and practice the material. It's easy to make new friends with shared interests.

effect.title: Effective language learning method
effect.point1: You choose a convenient schedule and time to complete tasks
effect.point2: A modern and efficient teaching method ensures high-level language mastery in a short period
effect.point3: Full automation allows us to offer the lowest price — 2, 3, or even 5 times cheaper than other language schools

step1.title: Registration
step1.text: Choose the language you're interested in and sign up.

step2.title: Setup
step2.text: Set your schedule and learning goals.

step3.title: Learning
step3.text: That's it! Start your first free lesson.

comment.title: What do our students say?
comment.name: Artyom M.
comment.text: I really enjoyed the course, mainly because of the unique system — I’m a moody person and can’t stick to the schedule of a private tutor or, even worse, a whole group. Sometimes I studied for hours on end — the way the material is presented is so easy and interesting. Once I even missed a whole week due to illness. Tests taken: 5

register.title: Register and start your first free lesson
register.agree: By submitting the application, I agree to the

faq.q1: How to register on the site?
faq.a1: Click the 'Register' button and fill in all fields.
faq.a2: Use the 'Forgot password?' link on the login page.
faq.a3: The site is available in Uzbek, Russian, and English.
faq.a4: You can send us a message via the contact form.
faq.a5: Yes, we protect your data with modern encryption technologies.

footer.description: Language2Go — an interactive platform for easy, convenient, and fast language learning.
